title: QBS (group)
text:
QBS was the second official sub-group of South Korean girl group T-ara based in Japan, with composed of three members: Boram, Qri and Soyeon. The trio only released one single, "Kaze no Yō ni" (風のように, "Like the Wind") in June 2013.


== History ==
In April 2013, T-ara N4's member through their press conference announced that the remaining members of T-ara: Qri, Boram and Soyeon would prepared a Japanese sub-unit. The sub-group focuses on the Japanese market, and released their debut single "Kaze no Yō ni" (風のように, "Like the Wind") on June 26, 2013.
In May 2017, Boram and Soyeon's exclusive contract had expired with MBK Entertainment and also left from T-ara, which also effectively the trio's disbandment.
